author: nishant0
content: Ok so a different question. if we hit

author: arnetheduck
content: lgtm - it reminds of the concern that was brought up about removing values from the config: one option is that we could leave the old constants in place and define them in terms of the new constants, _with a view_ to remove them after the next HF - that is a more gentle way of moving forwards with this (the new constant is after all just a consolidation and renaming of the two we had previously - semantically, it's the same)

author: nishant0
content:
That would be fine too and probably is better for non HF spec changes. The only issue is that we would need a new release with the old config values added back. 

A bunch of our config tests for testnets started failing because of removal of the deprecated config parameters
